My Resume
item.description: Grant Duval Los Angeles, CA grantduval@gmail.com Education BS, Business Administration - Information Systems Management; San Francisco State University 2008-2011 Work Highlights Platform Engineer Core Scientific April 2018 - Present Proactively identifying ways to improve and make technology more reliable Operating and maintaining AWS and on-prem infrastructure. Working to automate the provisioning, configuration, scaling, and monitoring of our infrastructure Building CI/CD pipelines and DevOps tooling Plan for the growth of infrastructure IT Specialist Ripple July 2014 - June 2017

item.title: Bucardo for the PostgreSQL replication for migration win!
item.description: How to install and get setup with Bucardo on Ubuntu Bucardo requires the Perl module DBIx::Safe to be installed Download here: $ tar xvfz dbix_safe.tar.gz $ cd DBIx-Safe-1.2.5 $ perl Makefile.PL $ make test $ make test $ sudo make install Download and unpack the Bucardo tarball Download here: $ tar xvfz Bucardo-5.6.0.tar.gz $ cd Bucardo-5.6.0 Install the Bucardo software $ perl Makefile.
